headline: Assessing IDEXX Laboratories (IDXX) Valuation After Recent Share Price Swings
summary: Why IDEXX Laboratories is on investors’ radar today IDEXX Laboratories (IDXX) continues to draw attention after recent share price swings, with the stock closing at US$656.73 and showing mixed returns over the past week, month, and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for IDEXX Laboratories. Recent trading has been choppy, with a 3.3% 7 day share price return set against a 9.9% 3 month share price decline. At the same time, the 1 year total shareholder return of 50.2% points to momentum...
